title: Baby Love Sitter
description:
Akira, a male escort, mistakes his customer with a single father Misaki who lives next door. Akira apologizes but is asked to babysit Misaki’s son, Towa, for the day! After being fired from his escort job, Akira is hired as a live-in nanny. Asking a man you’ve never met to babysit your kid…
Growing closer, Akira soon becomes irritated how the “nice” Misaki accepts anyone and everyone. Let the cute and clever Towa heal you as you read this heartwarming home erotic comedy!
